page.title: 09 PLAYTIME GAMES
page.content: {FOOTBALL.}Boys play football in the playground.Andrew & Mark pick sides and then we start playing.Mark is our captain because it's his ball.Today there are 5 on Andrews side and 13 on Marks.Andrews side lost 10-4. { Summer games.In summer, if its dry {we go on the field.We play}french skipping.{We use a long piece of {elastic tied like a band.You start {with the elastic round your ankles and {skip over it while the others sing a {rhyme.Then you repeat this with the {elastic higher up.}RED ROVER.Here you split into even groups & decide who goes first.This group calls the name of someone in the other team.This person has to break through our line. If they don't they are in our team. {Other kids play British Bulldog and {other chasing games like Tig.
